text:
STUDIO • PA Jamie Dornan sings in Fifty Shades Freed

The rendition of Maybe I’m Amazed is on the movie’s official soundtrack album, out today. Dornan’s no stranger to music, of course: he was in the folk band Sons Of Jim until 2008. His Maybe I’m Amazed is a straightforward piano cover, and Dornan’s voice sounds in very fine form indeed. It’s only 77 seconds long, though, so don’t get too attached. Stream below.

GETTY Dornan plays Christian for the final time in Freed

STUDIO STILL Despite terrible reviews it is expected to fare well at the box office

The star spoke about his performance during an interview with ITV’s Lorraine earlier this week. “I do sing - in the script he sings a Paul McCartney song. I sang it on the day,” he recalled. “Sarah MacLachlan, the Canadian singer, we were shooting in her house - and she did a rendition of her songs before and it was total reverie and everyone was spellbound. “Then she finished and everyone was crying and then it was like, ‘Jamie we’re ready for you now!’ Trying to follow that!”

Hottest moments from the new Fifty Shades Freed trailer Tue, January 2, 2018 The latest trailer shows that it certainly won’t be stingy with the sex scenes Play slideshow Youtube 1 of 13
